channel.title: Raveon's Show
channel.description: Welcome/Croeso to the DJ Raveon's podcast show. This will be a journey through some of the freshest dance tracks, remixes and lots of classic dance track! If you would like to be part of the show (guest mix and/or hear your track), send it to podcasts@designbeats.co.uk
channel.itunes:author: DJ Raveon
channel.itunes:subtitle: Welcome/Croeso to the DJ Raveon's podcast show. This will be a journey through some of the freshest dance tracks, remixes and lots of classic dance track! If you would like to be part of the show (guest mix and/or hear your track), send it to podcasts@designbeats.co.uk

channel.googleplay:author: DJ Raveon
channel.googleplay:description: Welcome/Croeso to the DJ Raveon's podcast show. This will be a journey through some of the freshest dance tracks, remixes and lots of classic dance track! If you would like to be part of the show (guest mix and/or hear your track), send it to podcasts@designbeats.co.uk

item.title: Raveon's Show #001
item.description:
Hello fellow music lovers, it's been a long time waiting, but I'm back. After the birth of my daugter DJing had to be to put on hold to make sure our daughter had the best start in life. She is now close to 5 years old, and the Rave is back on!
I will start with a monthly show, and if it does prove to be popular and I have time, it will be more frequent podcast.
In this very first episode I will take you through some of the stuff I was playing back in 2013...so sit back, turn on your speakrs and enjoy!
